title: Nick Viall mocks new Bachelor star Peter Weber's accident with hilarious Halloween costume
text:
Nick Viall commemorated upcoming Bachelor Peter Weber in the form of a Halloween costume.

The 39-year-old reality star made light of Weber's recent accident that ended in a serious facial injury as he dressed up as a pilot for weekend festivities.

Viall took to Instagram to share a photo of himself donning a pilot’s shirt with a pair of aviators stashed in the pocket and holding a pilot’s hat and rose.

LOL: Nick Viall commemorated upcoming Bachelor Peter Weber in the form of a Halloween costume making light of Weber's recent accident that ended in a serious facial injury

The former Bachelor star (who's had multiple stints on the ABC show and its spin-offs) took the costume up a notch with a band-aid on his forehead.

'Just a Pilot on a flight for love .. will probably crash into a windmill tonight,' he captioned the photo.

Weber, 28, suffered a serious injury in the middle of filming season 24 of The Bachelor on a golf course in Costa Rica.

Disguise: Viall took to Instagram to share a photo of himself donning a pilot’s shirt with a pair of aviators stashed in the pocket and holding a pilot’s hat and rose

'It was a two-hour drive from the course to the hospital in San Jose; he got 22 stitches in his face,' a source told Us Weekly.

'The reason he traveled for two hours to a hospital was that this specific hospital had a surgeon that specialized in his injuries. He underwent surgery.'

Host Chris Harrison, 48, also made a statement to the publication and confirmed the scary incident.

'Peter suffered a freak accident. He got a cut on his head, he did get stitches but he’s 100 percent OK and production is already back underway,' Harrison said.

Ouch: Us Weekly reported earlier this month that Weber, 28, 'suffered a serious injury' in the middle of filming season 24 of The Bachelor on location in Costa Rica

'He’s still the dashing, handsome pilot we’ve all dreamed of.'

Weber vied for Hannah Brown's hand in marriage on season 15 of The Bachelorette.

Brown, 28, famously revealed to contestant Luke Parker, 24, that she had sex several times in a windmill with one of the contestants, who happened to be Weber.

'I have had sex. And honestly, Jesus still loves me. From obviously how you feel, me f***ing in a windmill, you probably wanna leave,' she said to Parker.

Honest: Brown, 28, famously revealed to contestant Luke Parker, 24, that she had sex several times in a windmill with one of the contestants, who happened to be Weber

'I f***ed in a windmill. And guess what? We did it a second time!' she added.

Viall had his own fair share of mayhem on his season of The Bachelor.

The Waukesha, Wis. native asked for Vanessa Grimaldi's hand in marriage during the season 21 finale in March 2017, but the 32-year-old special education teacher said she didn't want to get engaged on TV.

'I had a conversation with him, and I said, "Listen, wouldn’t it be better if we just date outside of the show and then get engaged? ‘Cause that’d be more meaningful. We’d get to know each other,"' she said on the Oct. 22 episode of the podcast Let’s Talk About It With Taylor Nolan.
